name: attract
effect: Causes the target to fall in love with the user, giving it a 50% chance to do nothing each turn. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail. If either Pok√©mon leaves the field, this effect ends.
short_effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Makes the opposite gender less likely to attack.
flavor_text.emerald: Makes the opposite gender less likely to attack.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: If it is the other gender, the foe is made infatuated and unlikely to attack.
